about_the_game:
Step into the tantalizing world of online entertainment with "CamGirl Simulator"! This immersive simulation game puts you in control of your own virtual cam model career. Experience the highs and lows of the industry as you navigate the challenges and rewards of being a popular camgirl.

Key Features:

    Create Your Persona: Customize your camgirl's appearance, personality, and style. Choose from a wide range of outfits, hairstyles, and accessories to make your avatar truly unique.

    Live Streaming: Engage with your audience in real-time. Use interactive features to build a loyal fanbase and fulfill special requests to keep your viewers entertained.

    Career Management: Balance your time between streaming, personal life, and self-care. Manage your schedule, set goals, and upgrade your equipment to enhance your performance and attract more viewers.

    Monetization: Earn virtual currency through tips, subscriptions, and private shows. Invest your earnings to improve your setup, buy new outfits, and unlock exclusive content.

Unleash your creativity and ambition in CamGirl Simulator. Whether you seek fame, fortune, or fun, your journey to becoming the ultimate cam model starts here!

Note: This game contains mature content and is intended for an adult audience.

content_descriptors.notes: Depictions of consensual sexual acts and egregious nudity. Simulated sexual acts such as masturbation and penetration. Erotic chat messages simulating a sexual webcam enviornment.

name: CamGirl Simulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i7 4790k
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
